text: anal, evarkal iman kontu, salihana (nalla) amalkal ceytu, muham'matu mitu irakki arulappatta (vetat)tin mitu - itu avarkalutaiya iraivinitamiruntu (vantu)lla unmaiyaka irukkiratu enru nampikkai kolkirarkalo, avarkalutaiya timaikalai avarkalai vittum pokki, avarkalutai nilaiyaiyum cirakkukinran
